channel.title: Chasing
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Chasing" - Choose whether you are a ninja chasing another ninja for some reason or you are being chased by another ninja. Or of course both!!!

item.title: Re: Chasing
item.content:encoded:
erm.The two men came out of the hot springs,walking angrily out as the place burned behind them.

"Now"-said the young ninja "What was your plan again?"

"Burn,kill innocents.Wait for fun to arrive in the form of ninjas thinking they can take us out."
"So did we really have to kill those women and childrent?"
"Sentimental?-why do you ask?"
"I had no problem killing.I see it fruitless now though"
"What happened to those other ninjas though?"
"Power levels were under 10000"
"and they challenged US?"

item.title: Re: Chasing
item.content:encoded: Nah don't know what to do next.

item.title: Re: Chasing
item.content:encoded: ok ok then you can continue.Oh,and I'm partially sorry for the 110 days I didn't post anything.It isn't my fault though.

item.title: Re: Chasing
item.content:encoded:
Within about 10 seconds the 30 ninja were captured and druged. "Do you think these losers will rall be enough" asked the rider. "Of course not, thats why i made these," said Shady Neo and then he pulled out a box of pills "these will power you up to 10 times the chakra."

Wait a second, why dont we just use them? asked the rider,clearly confused. "Because they kill you and on another note…."

item.title: Re: Chasing
item.content:encoded:
"Yeah,I get them"
"All of those guys hardly match our chara"
"Too bad they're not going to comply with them"
"Huh?"
"Figure it out,Sempai"
"I have already.Sharp as always"
"Did you expect anything else"
"No.You really have given me some fun with these guys,finally!"
"Didn't take all that much did it,Sempai?"
The man was using his WhiteEye now
"We're getting near the hot springs now"-he said smirking strangely
The other man punched him into a tree quickly,slightly infuriated
"Pervert"
"Look who's talking,Jealous.Getting angry over not being able to use my WhiteEye to see through walls and such"
"Look who's talking,Jealous.Getting angry over not being able to use my WhiteEye to see through clothes and such is more like it!"
"See!That's the jealousy talking right there!"

item.title: Re: Chasing
item.content:encoded:
"Aww dam, they left," said Shady Neo. "So where we gonna get a large supply of chakra now?" asked the rider, "we need it or a lot more people are gonna die." Calm as always Shady Neo replied "don't worry they arent the only options."

As if on cue they heard the kind of footsteps that only ninja can hear. The footsteps of other ninja.

"Something you want to tell me?" asked the rider. Shady Neo activated his White Eye and counted the ninja before saying "here come the last of our friends at the toxic village 30 in total, that should be enough."

item.title: Re: Chasing
item.content:encoded:
the first man was clearly annoyed now
"DAMN!This is no fun."
"I agree,if only they'd stop running and trying to lure us into their plan!"
"Let's go.We have much better things to do instead of following these guys around all day"

The two men set off in another direction from where they came.1

Footnotes
1. all fer now until we get sum proper fight scenes

item.title: Re: Chasing
item.content:encoded:
As Shady Neo and the new horseman rode miles, they started to exchange information for their plan.

"So, those are the 2 powerful ninja we need right?" said the mysterious rider. "You got it in one," said Shady Neo "I just hope we can convince them to fight for the 2 of us." "Well if we can't its your fault," said his companion with a grin "oh by the way i found hecter 1690, no way will he ever find SNAKEMAN the way he is."

"Thats good," said Shady Neo clearly releived "Now we can focus on our true plan. I just hope we can use these 2 on time, either way did you complete your part of the mission?" he asked already knowing the answer. "Of course, what kind of idiot do you take me for?"said the rider and then thought better "Don't answer that."

item.title: Re: Chasing
item.content:encoded:
1

"There's two now.On top of a third chakra signal,unusual to normal ninja"
"So he isn't a regular extremist who uses poison and children for his own sake without care for others.Since if that were the case,the other two chakra signals wouldn't be there right now."
"So is he payed then?Well,really….it doesn't matter.We're not hunter-nin,we've surpassed that level a long time ago,nor are we the scum hunting missing-nin for ryo,and from what I know he isn't a missing-nin."
"Whatever.Labs 4&5 are down now"
"Howmany did you get again?"
"12"
"Perfect rotation,of chakra,mind and body"
"So I guess you'll get your fun now eh Sempai?"
"We'll see.They're moving faster now,I really hope that they're not running away from a good fight!"
"I hope not,anyways,we will still have to investigate into the other two chakra signals"
The man sighed"Guess so"
"Sempai,you DO realize that the WhiteEye's aren't gonna be very happy about this right?"
"Killing my own kin?Well,I guess not.But then again,they won't care once they know what he was up to.Then,at that point he can be trialled!"
"After he's dead,right?"
"Is there any other way?"

The two men laughed as they set forward even faster than before,into their destination.

"So the checklist is the 3 guy's up ahead,and then we'll check about them with that guy he was talking about-hectar1690,right?"
"Right.But did he really have that many subjects?Where did he even get them?"
the two men looked at each other,then burst out laughing louder than before,giving away their position to any in a 5-mile radius
"Stop pretending you even care,Sempai.It's putting us off"

Footnotes
1. They might depending on skill and the fact that they are too small to be hit by a monster that sized when they are using elements against him.

item.title: Re: Chasing
item.content:encoded:
So the children were dead, that was bad. Then again it might be better considering what he had put in them. Now that he thought about it, it was better they didn't get to roam free. But some of them would survive, infact one of them couldn't ever be killed.

A figure who radiated power rode up to Shady Neo on a black horse. "Got bounty hnter nin after you again, god you can be pathetic," he said, his tone mocking. Shady Neo answered "Are you just here to mock me, because if so I have a few things to say about your face." With that the rider reached down and pulled Shady Neo up onto the horse and rode on it down the road.

Footnote: Clones have no chance against a genetically enginered moster who absorbs Chakra

item.title: Re: Chasing
item.content:encoded:
first big mad creature thingy didn't survive.Was tooken down by the clones.

The two men had arrived at the third lab by now.
"Okay,let's get this over with already!"
"what's that?Look Sempai,children"
"Yeah.We should put them out of their misery already"
The second ninja looked at his Sempai,nervous that he should be the one to kill them.
"right.So that's how it'll be then?You'd prefer to free some children and let them go into the wild to starve,and suffer until Death gradually takes them over time?-Your choice"
"Understood.Sempai"
"Oh,and use Fire again this time will you?I have an idea that I should've thought of before the clones took the first creature down!"

The second man nodded again.He jumped up once again! "Fire style:Grand fireball technique!"
The first man looked up
"That's all?"

The second man brought a fan out from his jacket,and blew the fire to a tremendous size engulfing the entire lab,takking the children's lives somewhat painfully!

item.title: Re: Chasing
item.content:encoded:
The clones Chakra made the creature strong enough to harden its skin, and have enough left over to begin its task. And with that he sniffed the air and caught the faintest of scents and headed off to the Venom Village to finish the job his creator started.

Let them keep destroying the labs Shady Neo thought, he had all he needed from them anyway. But he felt they should at least hesitate before destroying the 3rd lab. He didn't have time to release the children before he had to flee. He hoped they wouldn't die, he really did.

item.title: Re: Chasing
item.content:encoded:
oh right.Thought you said you hit me.Anyways…

as the two ninja were already going to the next lab they looked back and saw a creature made mostly of fire rising from the ashes of the lab.

"?????There will be more of those"
"Not our problem.If someone says it is,we can show him otherwise."
"we could easily take it out,Sempai"
"Yeah,that part is obvious"
"I'll send some clones over.Can't help but feel guilty.Send some over aswell will ya',Sempai!"
"multiple shadow clone technique!"-All of the clones turned their WhiteEye on,and went out with their original's students to the beast to take it down.
"Still a waste of chakra the way I see things"

and with that,they arrived at the second lab.

"Sempai,let's make sure nothing comes out this time"

The man crouched,and using his strength and the groundhog decapitation technique,dragged a major support far into the earth,with the rest crumbling and reaching teh same fate!1

Footnotes
1. The one speaking it Italic is the WhiteEye who took the platoon down.He is the Sempai of the one speaking in Bold.They are both jonin,with teh first being at least Sannin-level!

item.title: Re: Chasing
item.content:encoded:
(I didn't say I hit you, I said you hit me. Or have you forgotten about Eleventy Billion Palms)

As Shady Neo looked over the horizon he saw a glowing fire, looks like he got out of his lab just in time. Now he had to run, because they knew where he was, which was just as he had planned.

These guys were dangerous right now, dangerous but they had there purpose.

And as the lab burned, something was awakening within the fire, absorbing the heat as energy, it would be ready soon. And then it would find its target and it would kill.

item.title: Re: Chasing
item.content:encoded:
…wait,when did you hit me?It was only the regular clone that can't be hit that you got close to so far mate.Sorry about that.Anyways…

"…that's all the info I was able to gather on the ninja he had interest on"
"good.Anyways,we have to get moving a bit faster now.I think he's leaving.He laid chakra signs on the ground to make sure.Means he wouldn't be able to sense us himself.He's deep into something,and I guess he didn't intend us to come around."
They stopped as they reached the location.
"Do we need to search it?"
"No reason to.Probably filled with poison traps.Blow it to hell."

The other ninja nodded.He jumoed up,and with a couple of hand signs started his technique-
"Fire style:Dragon Flame Jutsu!"

and with that he let a stream of red-hot fire right through the base.Cutting through it like a hot knife through butter.
"One down,all the others left!"

item.title: Re: Chasing
item.content:encoded:
They were coming, Shady Neo knew it. His time was coming to an end and if he stayed here much longer millions would die because of it. He knew they were coming to where he was, and it wasn't just an inkling, when he was in a fight with that person he let a hit get in at him. One touch was all that was needed to transfer a few millions of the bacteria he had crawling over his skin. And now he could use that bacteria for survalance purposes.

Of course this was an intelligent ninja who would eventually figure it out but the bacteria had already served a useful purpose. And he was exited to try out that new Other Effect…

But for now he had to run because there was an even more powerful ninja with him.

item.title: Re: Chasing
item.content:encoded:
okay okay then.Have fun with it!
Anyways,I'll continue:

The man looked up-"There you are,Sempai"
"yeah,sorry if I kept you waiting!"
"No problem.Anyways,I've collected the info about him"
"oooooooo0oh,really?This should be interesting then!"-The man took an envelope from his student."interesting"
"He seems to be doing something really secret.I have some of his labs tracked by now.He probably changes to make sure he isn't spotted"
"that so?He seems to be doing something pretty interesting then."
"Don't get too interested,Sempai.He disguised himself just to stay in a hotel.He'd be too much of a drag on us.Generally,people know of our almost unstoppable combos and retreat.But this guy,he doesn't seem to be much up-to-date.HIs methods are also strange.Although the WhiteEye is generally used to cut off te opponents choices in battle,he used it to sense chakra and use it for his own kind of medicine and poison."

The first man got up again.
"Why is it you almost always dislike being around new types of people???.Sometimes,it pisses me off"
"I guess it's just I always want to know about the enemy bu—"
"But we don't know about this enemy.I've heard it a million times form you so far.Cut it out for once and stop whining.You've nothing to fear.
"Yeah,you're right.He might stand a chance against another of his clan that is about the same strength as him,but against the two of us at once,he'll need a couple of aces up his sleeve,or some really big luck,which people don't have if tey get interested in us"

The first man got up,and started off into the forest.The second went after him,and started leading the way to te nearest lab he had found!

item.title: Re: Chasing
item.content:encoded: Its a special substance which mixes with the Chakra which the clones are created with, and by doing so the substance becomes blood, I wont bore you with the fine chemistry of it.

item.title: Re: Chasing
item.content:encoded: Blood from clones?Clones poof before they can give off blood.Needless to say,they have no blood in them.Well,it can't be extracted properly anyways.

item.title: Re: Chasing
item.content:encoded:
While all this was happening Shady Neo was several countries away in his Clone research lab. From here he had discovered many Clone related things. One of his greatest acheivements was the discovery of a substance which could extract blood from clones.

But this was an experiment that if it went right, would give him more power than the limits of even HIM…

item.title: Re: Chasing
item.content:encoded:
Hhehe.It isn't a shadow clone.Normal clone mate.Also,shadow clones don't give off blood from what I know.Anyways,I'll continue:

"The man on the toilet looked up.Well,I'll have to go now.Can't use too much time here!"
He got up and left(don't worry,washed his hands)

He looked around him
"I wonder if he's in position now"
Back at the forest,another man was watching the one that had recently come into contact with his ally.
He looked at the battalion soldiers laying on the ground and at the surroundings…
"Sempai didn't hold back this time now,strange.Generally,he doesn't use physical abilities to fight enemies.But it doesn't matter.I've been instructed to identify this guy for sure.He then got up.No point in staying here anymore.I have him figured out for the most part.Now I just need one more hint."

item.title: Re: Chasing
item.content:encoded: I knew that, I only needed the blood of your clone for what I am going to use it for…

item.title: Re: Chasing
item.content:encoded: Dude,my charcater is already gone and I continued the story past this part already.Sorry.My character is somewhere where your character can not in any way reach him,the toilet in a town far off.That was a clone from before.He switched with it straight after the first fight mate.

item.title: Re: Chasing
item.content:encoded:
And next thing he knew he was on the ground after being struck by one million palms. By the time he opened his eyes he was tied up and Shady Neo stood over him. "See how good a Clone Jutsu I have. Not only did it fool your now tied up dogs but it even fooled your White Eye."

The man struggled but couldn't budge, "Oh and dont bother strugleing, those ropes are infused with micro-organisms that absorb chakra the more you fight the quicker you die." Shady Neo said. He then took out his trench knife and dug it deep into the ninjas thigh. "Ok I have all I need from you now."

With that he produced a smoke bomb and performed the Escape Jutsu before the real ninja could attack him.

item.title: Re: Chasing
item.content:encoded:
The ninja looked up "Seems that you're pretty good with that WhiteEye of yours" Suddenly,all 9 ninja dogs burst from the ground from all sides,instantly trapping him.
"Not good enough though"

"Now,mind telling me why you think I am weak enough to not know that?" "It's really quite obvious you know…There is no need whatsoever to warn me about dangers which cannot count for me.I can fight short range,but I start off fighting long-range.Those ninja are trained to assasinate,therefore have no chance whatsoever against a long-range fighter of my strength!"-and with that,the man was gone.The wolfpack poofed into the air,and the man was going back to a spot where the other ninja could not follow him.He stopped once he arrived at his destination,and took out his bingo book.
"That's him alright-100k ryo.Not that much for a gambler such as myself,but once my bounty raises,I'll have more,and 100k extra will be enough"

item.title: Footnotes
item.content:encoded: 1. Its ok it actually makes the story more interesting

item.title: Re: Chasing
item.content:encoded:
Meanwhile Shady Neo came to a sudden stop, he new the other ninja was powerful but alone he couldn't beat this army.

Venom Village, the ninja village in Toxic country, had that name because they were masters of poison. He had dealt with cadavers of the victims of genin from that village, so he nknew a single drop could kill you. He had also heard a rumor that as a ninja ranked up in Venom Village, he was supplied with more powerful poisons.

Shady Neo turned around and headed back towards his new friend, well he had already killed enough ninja from Venom Villageto have a 100million Ryo bounty on his head, what a few more million. He came to the spot of ground he could see from White Eye that his new ally was hiding. "Might want to watch out, these ninja are knowen for the poisons that tip every single one of their weapons, and they have been selectively bred over the last 100 years to be immune to it themselves." Get ready to fight an army of over 1000, and know that if you get scratched even once you will die."

item.title: Re: Chasing
item.content:encoded:
The man looked around "20 countries?Blahh.How can he speak of 20 countries after me when he's got 50 on looking for his head on a silver plate"??

He looked around,and saw the man up about 500 meters up ahead.He knew he was of his clan aswell,although he had not known of him.He was surely using his WhiteEye to make sure to know if he was being followed by him,but also to keep track.He had gotten strangely more paranoid after the platoon had been broken up.It might've been a tracking force,and they would know that if it had been stopped in it's tracks,the man had help.He looked back up in the man's direction,1200 meters now.He looked up,sensing the man's chakra ""Our clan has a distinct ability to sense others of our clan when they have their abilities activated""therefore the man would know if he were following him should he use the WhiteEye to track him.He turned off his WhiteEye,I can still track him by chakra if he has his WhiteEye active.He looked up,and in a flash he was gone aswell.

As he neared he saw the difference in the timing of their footsteps in the ground,telling him the difference of their timing and therefore their speed.Using the info,he knew he had 20 seconds until he could be sensed through his chakra.He launched himself with all his strength into the ground,going through it using Earth Element techniques and deciding to follow under ground,where he stopped,took a scroll out and immediately rolled it onto the ground,a pack of dogs emerging.He gave them a piece of teh man's clothing that the platoon was using to track him "GET HIM!"1

Footnotes
1. Oh yeah,sorry about my posts being a bit too long.Force of habit.

item.title: Re: Chasing
item.content:encoded:
Shady Neo got upp looking bruised but otherwise uninjured, he turned on his White Eye and said "Thanks for the help, but unless you want 20 countries after you I suggest you leave me alone."

"On the other Hand if thats what you want I suppose you could always help me find hecter1690, hes trying to find SNAKEMAN and I need to find him first or those two could cause the death of countless billions together."

Shady Neo turned and said "If you want to help, your gonna need to keep up." Then within a flash he was off at an incredible speed.

item.title: Re: Chasing
item.content:encoded:
As a silent ninja stood in the tree-tops,watching te man running he watched the army behind him using his WhiteEye.He smirked,got up,and used teh multiple shadow clone technique.He then used Water Style:Water Dragon Missile to intercept the army.Afterwards,each clone used te water clone technique to make 3 water clones.The water clones took each ninja in their respective teams of 3,and if 1 was destroyed,the other two would burst into water by their own free will,after which the shadow clone which made them would use the water to imprison the enemy ninja using the water imprisoment jutsu.

Afterwards,the army was left scattered and bewildered as all clones disappeared,leaving smoke,and water.Then,they heard a loud voice.
"Water Style:Giant water vortex technique",flooding them.After which,the voice was heard again-"Fire style:Immortal phoenix flames!",after which shots of fire burst into the ground from above,further confusing the army.Scattered,they turned to their leader for instructions—only to find he had been assasinated in the confusion.

The real ninja then appeared in front of Shady Neo,quickly activating his WhiteEye and using his Elventy Billion palms technique,sending him through a tree and severing his chakra flow "Now,tell me why I just had to take down an entire platoon!"

item.title: Re: Chasing
item.content:encoded:
Ok then !!!

Shady Neo started running again, strong as he had become recently, he was no match for the toxic countrys ninja army. And as luck would have it, they were only 300 feet away from catching him.

item.title: Re: Chasing
item.content:encoded: Running and hiding don't seem like much fun but army do.So,care to start off?!

item.title: Re: Chasing
item.content:encoded: Pretty much just running, hiding, and fights. Oh and an army of ninja or two.

item.title: Re: Chasing
item.content:encoded: *clears throat*.So,I see there's a new thread.What type is it other than tracking,just fights to the death?

item.title: Chasing
item.content:encoded: Shady Neo made a wrong turn somewhere in life, as a result over 20 countries wanted him dead for criminal experimentation. On top of that the ninja he created in a test tube was seeking out SNAKEMAN. Shady had to find him first or surrender all the secrets in the body.
